title: 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim
subTitle: Text Adventure / Combat Simulation
desc: Vanillaware, the storytellers behind Odin Sphere and Dragonâ€™s Crown, craft a sci-fi mystery epic spanning thirteen intertwining stories.Uncover the truth and delve into a 2D sidescrolling adventure featuring gorgeous art and environments. Then, battle the kaiju in fast-paced, top-down combat. Customize the Sentinels with an arsenal of mechsuit weaponry, and fight to defend humanity!
